title: No corticosteroids for Patients with Sepsis with Mortality (60 days to 1 year)
description: Occurrence of Mortality with No corticosteroids for patients with sepsis

variableDefinition.description: Mortality Longer term (60 days to 1 year)

actualDefinition.display: many studies had shorter term outcomes

intendedDefinition.display: Mortality Longer term (Follow up: 60 days to 1 year)

note.text: 371 per 1000 experienced Mortality (60 days to 1 year)
Based on data from 6438 patients in 9 studies

certainty.description: Low, due to serious imprecision and indirectness.

note.text: Note that all studies that reported 90 day to 1 year mortality also reported 28-30 day mortality: the CI 95% around the pooled effect for short term mortality also excludes no effect: RR 0.91 (CI 95% 0.84 - 0.98).
Only a small proportion of studies reported longer-term mortality.
